text: Rowing has been contested at every Asian Games since its introduction to the program at the 1982 Asian Games. ==Editions== Games Year Host city Best nation IX 1982 New Delhi, India X 1986 Seoul, South Korea XI 1990 Beijing, China XII 1994 Hiroshima, Japan XIII 1998 Bangkok, Thailand XIV 2002 Busan, South Korea XV 2006 Doha, Qatar XVI 2010 Guangzhou, China XVII 2014 Incheon, South Korea XVIII 2018 Jakartaâ€“Palembang, Indonesia ==Medal table== ==Other websites== *Asian Rowing Federation Category:Asian Games
title: Rowing at the Asian Games
